name: Namco Museum Vol. 4
description:
Play these arcade-perfect hits from Namco and relive the action! Includes Pac-Land, Ordyne, Assault, The Return of Ishtar, and The Genji and The Heike Clans.

This title is compatible with the PSP™, PS Vita, and PS3® systems.

This item is being licensed or sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America and is subject to the Network Terms of Service and User Agreement, this item’s use restrictions and other applicable terms located at www.us.playstation.com/support/useragreements. This item may be used with up to 2 activated PlayStation®3 systems and 2 portable systems associated with this Sony Entertainment Network account.
